com.pcloud.networking.api

Interface CallAdapter<T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The source type
    R - The adapted result type

    public interface CallAdapter<T,R>
    An adapter that allows modifying the return type.

    Install a implementation of CallAdapter.Factory by calling com.pcloud.networking.api.ApiComposer.Builder#addAdapterFactory(Factory) or ApiComposer.Builder.addAdapterFactories(Iterable)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CallAdapter.Factory
      A factory class for creating CallAdapter instances.

 throws java.io.IOException
        Adapt a Call to a R
